item.description:
Join up with Robyn & a couple of friends (guys & gals from other groups) after their trip to the MFA, for some Sunday afternoon creature comforts:
Conversation & Chat, Cold Beer (or other Beverages), Tasty Appetizers, Patriots Game on TV (4:15pm game vs Oakland Raiders), Discussion of the relative merits of NFL versus Rugby Union.... and more!

Come on down for a nice casual and relaxing end to the weekend at a fine Boston neighborhood pub. No charge for this event - but you're responsible for your own food & beverage tab.

For directions and more info re: The Mission Bar & Grill, go to:
http://www.themission...

FYI: The Green Line and No 39 Bus go right by the Mission, so it's very easily reached by public transport (recommended since parking can be a bit tight in Brigham Circle area and/or if you want to heartily celebrate the Patriots' winning against Oakland).

Any questions, please contact Robyn via Meetup e-mail
item.how_to_find_us: Robyn looks like her pics; look out for a group of 6-12 tall folks at a table
item.name: Sunday Afternoon "Chill Out": Mission Bar & Grill
